Header.title: Consumer Utility Advocate
Header.paragraph: Save Money on your every day utility expenses!

About.paragraph: We have one mission!  To save you $$$ on your ever day utility expenses.
Why: No charge to use our services!
We educate you to make the best choice!
Our service is free to use!
Why2: We do business in multiple states!
Experienced agents to help you save!

Services.name: Pennsylvania
Services.text: We service multiple utility companies in the keystone state!  Enter your zip code above to see how we can save you money!

Services.name: Ohio
Services.text: Enter your zip code above to see how we can save you money in the buckeye state!

Services.name: Connecticut
Services.text: With local utility delivery costs skyrocketing, there has never been a better time to choose a supplier!  Enter your zip code above, and know how much you are paying for the supply.

Services.name: Massachusetts
Services.text: Did you know that the state of Massachusetts has some of the highest supply costs in the deregulated energy market?  Enter your zip code above to see how much we can save you!

Services.name: New York
Services.text: Enter your zip code above to see how we can help you save on both electricity and gas supply services!

Services.name: New Jersey
Services.text: Let us help you select a supplier to save you money on your generation costs.  Enter your zip code above.

Features.text: Shop the best secure rate plans on the market!
